= How to use vertical slide with joSlider =

If you use a vertical slide option, you must add in your Joomla! content, a tag "ul" with the class "slidesVertical" :


{{{
<ul class="slidesVertical">
            <li><p>Vertical Slide 1</p></li>
            <li><p>Vertical Slide 2</p></li>
            <li><p>Vertical Slide 3</p></li>
            <li><p>Vertical Slide 4</p></li>
</ul>
}}}

For more information : http://www.slidedeck.com/usage-documentation/vertical_slides/
